extension.name: Hikashop out of order notification Plugin
extension.author: Hikashop
extension.description: This plugin enables you to be notified when products are out of stock

param.name: period
param.label: Period
param.description: Period before you are notified that products are out of stock (in seconds)

param.name: last_cron_update
param.label: Last update
param.description: Last date on which the products' stock was checked via the CRON task

param.name: stock_limit
param.label: Stock limit
param.description: You can enter here the product quantity under which you will be notified
